name: peterszerzo.com
description: Source code for my personal website.

scripts.start:site: npm run prep:site && NODE_ENV=development ELM_APP_MAIN=Site elm-app start
scripts.start:overeasy: npm run prep:overeasy && NODE_ENV=development ELM_APP_MAIN=OverEasy elm-app start
scripts.start:maddi: npm run prep:maddi && NODE_ENV=development ELM_APP_MAIN=Maddi elm-app start
scripts.build:site: npm run prep:site && NODE_ENV=production ELM_APP_MAIN=Site elm-app build && mv build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.build:overeasy: npm run prep:overeasy && NODE_ENV=production ELM_APP_MAIN=OverEasy elm-app build && mv build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.build:maddi: npm run prep:maddi && NODE_ENV=production ELM_APP_MAIN=Maddi elm-app build && mv build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.deploy:overeasy: npm run build:overeasy && surge build overeasy.sh
scripts.deploy:site: npm run build:site && surge build peterszerzo.com
scripts.deploy:maddi: npm run build:maddi && surge build annacingi.com

author: Peter Szerzo <szerzo.peter@gmail.com>
